reviews.review_text: Right as I walked in I was treated with a warm smile and ready for them to help me. I walked in for just a day pass and they took care of it right away. Erika gave me a tour of the facility, very professional and good listener. Overall great facility and equipment. 10/10
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Roberto. Thank you for taking the time to post a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Golds Gym West Broadway. Our goal is always to exceed your expectations! If there s anything we can help you with, please don t hesitate to let us know. We hope to see you again soon, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: This is a great gym. The staff is very friendly and approachable if you have any questions and feedback on equipment etc. I would give this gym 4.5 stars only because they are missing a few key pieces of equipment but that s only if your the body builder kinda guy. But I did talk to them and they are planning on adding those pieces in the next couple years which is why I gave the 5 stars. One is the pendulum squat machine which is one of the best machines to add on your leg day to really focus on the quads better than any workout you can think of for the quads. The pendulum squat machine is very difficult to find in any gym so the fact that they re adding it is amazing. Another is a standing lateral raise machine, Some call it a Watson machine. Another is the standing T Bar Row, they do have the seated one, but it doesn t put you at the best angle but still workable. All in all a great gym if you can avoid the busy hours. Thank you Golds!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Daniel. Thank you for taking the time to post a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Golds Gym West Broadway. Our goal is always to exceed your expectations! If there s anything we can help you with, please don t hesitate to let us know. We hope to see you again soon, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: I was in Vancouver for a week last month and signed up for a weekly membership at Gold s. Their team was very friendly and it was a fantastic experience. I used the facility daily and had excellent workouts. They have some great equipment, a wide range of free weights and lots of machines. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Richard. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: Wonderful gym. Our staff worked there during the renovation and seen the highest quality equipment being placed and we decided to get memberships there and workout. Amazing facilities and the best value in the area. Great family owned franchise with happy positive staff.

the best gym round!!! and even better staff and members. Everyone  is so generously kind and supportive. From being a beginner starting out to trainers who have been training for decades. If every gym was like golds, no one would be home, but at the gym 24/7
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Dithni. We re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Golds Gym West Broadway. Your review made our day. Our team works very hard to keep our members happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing ones like you! We hope we can keep assisting in the process of reaching your fitness goals. Thank you, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: Love this gym! Facilities are well kept and theres plenty of equipment to work out on. Havent been in a bit but my go to recommendation to other people.
Staff are very approachable; gym cleanliness is well-maintained. Space is enough to do your workouts, never felt like its cramped even on busy hours.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Allana. Thank you so much for the review!  We are so happy to be a part of your Journey!~ Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: Capacious, cool staff, dope machines, mindful clientele, thoughtful layout, well ventilated.. day pass well worth it.  Bring a towel n good to go.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Mark. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: Really good gym with good equiptment. The staff are all lovely and friendly. Ive been at this gym 6 months and have had no problems at all. I also had personal training with Gordon, great trainer with a wealth of knowledge. Really helped me understand different ways to train and hit my goals. Super encouraging and motivating. Great PT.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Chloe. Thanks for the review! We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive fitness experience at Golds Gym West Broadway. Kindly, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: I checked out several gyms in the area and this one met all my needs. Clean, great equipment and lots of it. Many different areas to work out in. Friendly and helpful staff. I highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Kathrin. We are so happy you had a great experience with us. Thank you for taking the time to rate us! - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: Haven t been here long, but really loving it so far :) everyone is super nice (members and staff alike), and I m really enjoying being part of the Gold s community.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Joy. We are so happy you had a great experience with us. Thank you for taking the time to rate us! - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: Fantastic gym the girl who gave me the tour was knowledgeable kind and friendly. There definitely could be some more chest fly machines but overall a really good gym and environment. Will definitely be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Jared. We re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Golds Gym West Broadway. Your review made our day. Our team works very hard to keep our members happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing ones like you! We hope we can keep assisting in the process of reaching your fitness goals. Thank you, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: Great facility with friendly staff! Whether you are utilizing purely the gym or also taking any of the fitness classes (from Yoga, to Pilates, Spin to Zumba classes) that are offered you feel part of the Gold s Family and I have been a member for less than 2 weeks! Highly recommend taking one of Gemma s classes! And for those days you want to be alone, ladies, there s a ladies only section. Fthose on a budget, it is clear you really get the most bang for your buck out of this gym! It s really an all-in-one membership! The only thing I regret is not signing up sooner! Thanks Gold s Gym Broadway!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Maria. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Your Golds Gym West Broadway Family.

reviews.review_text: What prompted me to write this review is the fact that they noticed that I havent signed in to the gym for over 2 months and decided to reach out to see if I was okay and that if I wanted to I could pause my membership. Usually gyms are cash grabs where they oversell memberships and hope people dont show up but I really appreciated this gesture. Gym itself is usually great and not too busy during the weekdays. Has everything you need in a gym and is affordable.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Robert! We cant wait to see you back in the gym soon!

reviews.review_text: Very positive experience with Kirat from this location. He was very welcoming and professional throughout the whole membership on-boarding process.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Tra. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: As someone who had never worked out at the gym before, I was quite intimidated to get started! After 3 months of personal training with Bel, I am now confident in using the equipment and absolutely loving my new exercise routine (something I never would have thought I would say even 4 months ago!). Bel was such a patient, caring, and highly knowledgeable trainer. She helped me grow my confidence and skills to the point where I am now working out 4x a week and following my own custom plan which she created for me. I cannot recommend Bel and Gold s Gym enough!

Very queer friendly and inclusive gym represented by both staff and members. Nice and  Clean gym. Staff is walking around helping to put things away. When things are broken they are fixed in a timely fashion. I am always greeted by the  Friendly staff. Sam the GM is very helpful and friendly. Just wish it was bigger but maybe one day they will expand up stairs!  and maybe a dt location!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Riley! Thank you so much for your feedback! We will be sure to let her know! We love having you part of our community! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: That is a good place to have your workout done! Everyone is nice and polite. The equipments and structure are great!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Kianne. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: All the equipment and gym facilities are clean and great! I love all of their energetic group classes trainers :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Yejin, Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience at Golds Gym West Broadway! We are thrilled to hear that you found our equipment and gym facilities to be an elevated level of clean. Our energetic group class trainers work hard to create a motivating and enjoyable environment for our members! Thank you! Golds Gym West Broadway team

reviews.review_text: The best equipment in Vancouver, the staff is great, and the facility is always clean. Couldn t find a thing to fault!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Kirat! Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: Best Club downtown. Awesome Technogym equipment. CLEAN! Their Covid-19 cleaning standards are above and beyond. Putting forward their best interests in safety for their valued members. Friendly and welcoming staff. Sense of belonging to the club. Finally a downtown gym with some etiquette. Members put their weights away. Respectful environment. Equipment well laid out for spacing/social distancing. 1hr 45min free parking. Added crossfit sections. Lots of cardio machines! Huge big screens to catch up on your fave Sports between sets. A gym environment where you truly feel the value of health and fitness!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Dean! Thank you so much for the positive feedback! You are one of our loyal and valued members and we are so grateful you and the whole family are part of our Golds Gym community! We really do appreciate all of you! See you soon! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Compared to other gyms, I find the staff at this gym quite cooperative and helpful. The gym is quite clean and the equipments are in good condition.

First thing I noticed during my time at Golds gym is the large variety of equipment available to the public, as well as the amount of weights available for use (Not the free weight though). The layout of the gym floor is efficiently setup so that no corners are left unused. Couldn t have been more impressed with the service and my time here without help from Jessica as well. If they keep up the sales here I ll definitely get my friends to come along soon!

So I will start with the negative stuff: -most of the times free weights area can get crowded ( the good news is its not the whole day) I do think the gym management can re arrange the the gym in a better way to separate the free weights area from the machines area, the gym has plenty of empty space this will results in a less dense area) - The weights are annoying to put on and off easily into the bar (on the good side it wont be lose when you are bench pressing :)) -The changing room/locker area doesnt smell nice it doesnt smell bad either just no fresh air I guess ( install better ventilation plz) Now to the good stuff : -Nice friendly management and staff -The gym is always cleaned by someone all the time -New equipments and machines the best I think at least for all the gym I have been to all my life- 7 gyms total - -running machines treadmills has no TV! -location is great bus stop in front of the gym and there is parking underground as well I will update this review every few months
Nice gym , nice staff , would be good if there would be some shower gels or shampoo in changing room the rest is great
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate your feedback, Kateryna.- Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely excellent staff, facilities and personal trainers. Very good at adapting for those with medical issues and injuries. Experienced with hyper mobility.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Sally. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: For the classes, spinning, hot yoga and 24 hour access, this gym is definitely worth the membership. Parking is also free for 90mins and is a great perk especially for the busy location where parking elsewhere is costly/limited. Its a brand new facility with brand new equipment. Theres a small womens only section equipped with frew weights, cable machine, smith machine, leg adduction/abduction machines, lat pull down and some cardio machines.

The staff is always friendly and cheerful, even @5am which is a great start to the day. The facility is always clean, machines are rarely down for any period of time and there s ample room between stations to navigate without fear of tripping over someone. The facility has a good mix of free weights and machines so there s always options if the bench or machine you wanted to use is occupied. If you live within a 30min drive, this gym is well worth the commute. Also, a 1-time parking pass fee for free parking on the west side in a secured facility is a bonus!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Greg! We are grateful to have you part of our community and appreciate how much of a loyal member you have been! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: A gym with probably the best customer service, best aircon, and best quality machines. Im very pleased that the members here always have excellent etiquette, plates and dumbbells are always put back where they belong. There is free underground customer parking also
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the 4 stars Tony! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: I had a fantastic personal training experience with Bel at Golds Gym Broadway. She provided me with lots of attention to technique as well as knowledge and encouragement too. It was hard work but very rewarding to learn and work out with her :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Rachelle! Were glad you had a great experience and excited to see you continue on your fitness journey!

reviews.review_text: Been working out at this location for 5 months now. It is a great space with top-notch facilities for a good deal! The staff is also amazingly pleasant. I appreciate how keen they are with following covid safety precautions. I hope they keep the live tracker that lets members know how full the gym is in real time- real impressive move on their part that has allowed appropriate flexibility in fitting a workout in without having to book way ahead of time!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Dwayne, happy to be your top #1 Vancouver gym! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Raven is the most amazing trainer that I have ever had (and I would even go as far as to say the best trainer at the gym). She knows how to motivate clients and keep that motivation going even during the harder weeks. Also, she keeps you accountable without overwhelming you. Not only did she help me improve my physical health, but also my mentality when it came to fitness. Raven is also very knowledgeable about nutrition which was an added bonus. She is truly a fantastic trainer and basically a lifestyle coach all in one! 10/10 would recommend her for someone who is just starting out a fitness journey like I was, or even for those who are more experienced.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great feedback! We will be sure to let Raven know the kind feedback as well! Grateful to have you part our Golds Gym family! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Been working out at this gym for 2 months now! Have been very impressed with the friendliness of the staff, and can always find a free machine. When I go it s not too busy and they take their COVID precautions seriously, so I always feel safe. The women s only area is also a great addition to the gym! Would highly recommend this gym to others....excited for when group fitness starts back up!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the positive review Lauren! We are so happy you have chosen to be part of our community! Keep crushing those fitness goals! Happy lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Best gym in Vancouver by far. So spacious with new equipment which is a truly hard find for the city. Had a great introduction to the gym as well with the incredibly friendly and helpful Jessica, who is always available to help with anything, helping me find the best package for my needs. Can not recommend this gym more.

I love golds gym, started it there last year. Gotta say that Margarita, every time i come here she makes my day better and she makes the place more comfortable. Really nice staff they have. Keep it up!!!!
Great place, clean, good equipment friendly staff. And has underground parking for free

Ive been a member since they opened this location.  The facilities have been great, the group classes (when they could have them,) helped me get started on my fitness journey.  And their training staff are excellent. I signed up for a personal trainer last September and its been worth it. Raven is excellent at her job.  She listens to you and your goals, tailors the program to that, and gives you tools you need to work on it in your own. She can answer your questions about why, and the hows about the excersises.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jared! Thank you so much for the great feedback! We will be sure to let Raven know how much she is appreciated! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Amazing staff and environment . Got enrolled by Kyle on the first day walkthrough was amazing. Since I m an early bird I love how the gym is open at 5am. The free flow entry and exits on the gym is what I love the most because I would never have to wait for an appointment to get into the gym. Having a punching bag in the gym is a big plus and this reason why I chose to enrol with this gym! 5/5 Overall, best gym out there in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great review! We are so happy to have you part of our community and we will be sure to let Kyle know! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Great place to work out. Super nice and helpful staff. I have been training with Grace for almost 2 months and it has been quite an experience. Grace is an amazing personal trainer and really easy to get along with.  She has thoughtfully created the training program as per my goals and pushes me to achieve it. She shares her fitness knowledge in ways that are easily understood and often share her wisdom and tips on nutrition and diet. Highly recommend Grace if youre looking for a personal trainer.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Shohra! We appreciate the great feedback and will be sure to also relay the message back to Grace! Excited to watch you continue to crush your fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Staff is amazing - super helpful and friendly! The gym is always very clean and well taken care of! Great vibe and layout. Throughout the pandemic I have felt very safe going to Golds West Broadway. The staff is very diligent with their protocols and following guidelines.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, Taylor! Happy to hear you have been enjoying your experience here, happy lifting!

reviews.review_text: If youre looking for an amazing Trainer - request for Mirthy Cheung! If it wasnt for his attention to detail and constant motivation during and outside of training sessions -Id probably still have my Covid 15 weight  and be at a different gym. The place is pricey and I had offers for cheaper memberships with other gyms, but the personal training from Mirthy have brought my fitness level to a new level through proper technique, form and alternative workouts to maximize. Ive avoided sharing his talents in fear of him being overbooked, but he has made a tremendous difference in my personal fitness progress over the past 3 months, that others should also benefit from. The overall gym is clean and pretty pricey - but staff are awesome especially the front desk.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Marc! Thank you for the great review! We will be sure to let Mirthy know! We are grateful for having you part of our Golds Gym community :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Had an amazing experience here. Staff were accommodating and very friendly. Equipment is all well maintained. Highly recommended checking them out!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Bailey. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

reviews.review_text: So happy I joined this gym. So clean and staff actually walk around and care about their facility. Staff and management address us by our names. Everyone gets their own sanitizer bottle. There is an actual cleaner . Cleaning supplies are always available. When supplies have run out, it is replaced within minutes. I feel so comfortable being inside this place and I am so grateful I have a clean gym to work out of leading up to my competition! Props to Noz and the West Broadway Team!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Eva! Thank you so much for the 5 stars and the great feedback! We will be sure to relay the nice message back to the West Broadway Team! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: One of the best gyms on the West Coast and Vancouver! Close to my condo downtown! I can go anywhere in the World and use the travel pass and most of the fitness models who come to the city for periods of time will come use this facility. Almost 2 hours free parking provided. Free passes for my friends and family and colleagues to try out. Staff is super nice and easy to get along with! They know all the good spots in town, social and fitness. Prices are fairly reasonable. Policy/protocol with Covid is consistent and overall, a clean gym. I cannot find dust anywhere. Mirrors are sparkling clean for those gym selfies! One of the cleanest green turf areas I have ever seen in a gym. Way to uphold the brand Golds Gym! Never been a member of any other gym. Started off at the Mecca in L.A and now Golds Gym British Columbia!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing! Thank you so much for this review! We are grateful you chose our community to be a part of and that you tell all your friends and family about us! Next time youre in, please ask for the General Manager, Noz. She will be more than happy to give you some swag for all the referrals. Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Thank you to the staff at Vancouvers Golds Gym on West Broadway. As a 65 year old lifter, I have gone to Golds 4-5 times a week this year. I have felt safe every time I worked out. Staff has always been cordial when screening us members at the door, an extremely repetitive task. In addition, Golds trainers have always set an example of safety when training their clients. Impressed! As an older personal trainer myself, I appreciate the extensive equipment at Golds. And I appreciate good maintenance and hygienic practices by both staff and members. Golds has kept me safe and sane during this pandemic. Well done!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hugh! Thank you so much for the positive feedback! You are one of our favourite, loyal and most consistent members! We are so grateful to have you part of our Golds Gym Family! See you soon! Happy Lifting!! :)

reviews.review_text: Appreciative of the staff Noz and Nicole. With the transition back into the gym after Covid I was hesitant to return but they made me feel very comfortable and safe. Theyre always very respectable and aware of boundaries. Those two have really stuck out and I cannot thank them enough for making me feel as safe as I do in this gym. Some friends have made the switch as well when I told them how amazing they have been with the restrictions. The equipment is always monitored and clean and I love seeing the staff go the extra mile to help us all stay safe. Thank you both!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback! We will be sure to let Noz and Nicole that they are greatly appreciated! We are grateful to have you part our community! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Great front desk staff, always friendly and helpful.  Gym is spotless and even though it gets quite busy sometimes everything is being cleaned constantly.  Very happy with my membership which I paid for upfront so no monthly fees.

I have been a member of this gym for the past three months and I am very happy with my experience. All the staff very nice and helpful. I have also been training with a coach her name is Grace. She is the best. I never thought that one day I will be able to attain this level and improve my fitness level this much. Thanks to Grace
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great review and such a nice message for Grace! We will be sure to let Grace know! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Wow!! I couldn t be happier being a Gold s Gym Member. The facility is huge, sparkly clean, and has the most welcoming and professional staff to help you with all your needs. Huge shoutout to the amazing Gold s staff Noz and Nicole for always helping and motivating me throughout my whole experience at the gym. It makes coming to the gym so comforting and fun knowing you re surrounded by professional and incredible people. The booking system is so easy and awesome. I have always been able to get the time slot that I want and am able to cancel up to 10 mins before the session. Very convenient! I would definitely recommend Gold s Gym to all walks of life and would say it s the number one Gym in Vancouver and globally :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the positive feedback Kaitlyn! We are thrilled to have you part of our community! We will be sure to let the ladies know they are appreciated! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: I have been visiting Golds Gym since this March. The every member whether trainers or trainee follow the COVID-19 protocols. I have been working with this Amazing Trainer Grace Wang, she is focused and determined in bringing best out on the clients. She is well experienced and also creative when it comes to workout. I personally everyday look forward to do workout with her. Worth joining and taking Personal training at this Gym.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Karanpreet! Thank you so much for the 5 star review! We will be sure to let Grace know that she is very appreciated! We are excited to watch you crush your fitness goals here at Golds Gym West Broadway! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Love this gym! It was so hard finding a spacious gym in Vancouver with up to date equipment while still being affordable, but Golds Gym on West Broadway checks all of the boxes! The owner and team that works there are so nice and accommodating as well. Definitely check this gym out!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great feedback Fatemeh! We are grateful to have you part of our community! Continue to crush those fitness goals! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Overall, a great gym. The gym staff is always polite, professional, and they do a great job making sure the facilities are clean and tidy. As well, the General Manager, Noz, always takes time out of her day to stop and say  hi  to gym members during their sessions. Really makes it feel like you re part of a community.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the positive review Alexi! We will be sure to let Noz know she is appreciated. We also appreciate that you have remained a loyal member to us during the hard times! Looking forward to many more good times and to watch you on your fitness journey! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: So... As a long term member of another gym, I have to say that it was very weird making golds into my new home but its kind of warming up to me. the staff at golds are super nice. Although inconvenient with the whole time slot thing I like that golds has frequent times that they go around to clean and disinfect all the gear. I really like that the gym is very inviting for people that want to practice Olympic weight lifting as the platform, bars and plates are all eleiko branded. I hope one day the gym will once again be 24/7 with the showers! but we all take it one step at a time. overall its a really nice experience training at golds and I recommend it :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback Kristian! We will be making some changes in the next couple months ... Stay tuned! We are grateful for your passion on the Olympic lifting platforms! See you soon! :)

reviews.review_text: If I could give 6 stars I would! I am so impressed with this gym. It is an organized, incredibly clean and safe place with top notch covid protocols. The extremely friendly, hard working and accommodating staff make you feel welcome and the equipment is always in great condition. Especially during such uncertain times, it s so nice to be able to go to a place where you feel like family Way to go!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback. We are so happy to have you part of our family! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Jessica at Golds Gym has just been amazing! The follow-up to me was key since Ive always had a busy schedule. She gave clear precise instructions on my first day and never made me feel pressured to join the gym. I always hated that from other gyms. Thank you so much for your help! Oh and she also got a friend of mine the same good October deal! What a steal!

Great! Im a new member and I am loving Golds Gym! Due to covid, I havent had a gym membership in 2 years, but I miss Gym Life so I decided to get back into yearly Gym membership. I browsed several other gyms before checking out Golds Gym. From my friends referral I got to check out Golds Gym free for a day.  Honestly, Golds Gym was the best out of all the other gyms I checked out. I really like how West Broadway Golds Gym has new well-maintained clean equipment and the gym itself is clean. The gym has enough space that I can find a quiet space for myself to stretch before working out. The West Broadway staff are friendly, welcoming, and always helpful. The General Manager Noz is super sweet and nice, and she really cares about all the members. Noz is the best! I recommend you check out Golds Gym, It is definitely the best in Vancouver!!!! I hope they open a Burnaby location in the near future!!

Been going to this gym for nearly 2 years now, not only are staff members friendly but the community as a whole is great too! Clean environment and friendly people from all walks of life. From fighters to bodybuilders, and powerlifters to Olympic lifters, it s nice to see the diversity in the fitness world at this gym. Trainer Mirthy is cool too. Non-intimidating, all inclusive gym c:
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback. We are so grateful to have you part of our community Kevin! We will make sure to let Mirthy know how much you appreciate him! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: The staff here are super knowledgeable and genuine. I ve really enjoyed the large facility and online booking system. I ve gotten in every time I ve ever scheduled; you just have to look for last minute drop outs the day of. The capacity is 60 in the gym at a time. Big clean space. They sanitize the facility between each cycle of members. They also provide you with a spray bottle/sanitary wipes. They are keeping everything very controlled and clean while going thru this pandemic. I m super impressed with the level of care from the staff, and legitimate interest in getting to know us as individuals when we joined. Special shout-out to Nicole for always greeting us with a warm and friendly smile, asking us about our day/workout, and making sure everything is taken care of. Same with Noz. One of the best gyms I ve been to over the years.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback Chantel! We will be sure to let the ladies know that they are appreciated. We are grateful you are part of our community. We are excited to watch you achieve your goals with us! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: This is the best gym I ve ever been to, and I ve been to a lot of gyms. Everyone is so friendly and helpful. The machines and weights are top notch. They keep the place clean and they make it really easy to book a workout. The girl at the front desk, I think her name is Cy, is the best :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you James! We really appreciate the feedback and we will be sure to let Cy know! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Amazing place! Safest place ! The most friendly and professional staff who are always happy and helpful. Thank you for keeping us safe and letting us work hard day by day . Keep up the hard work ! When you need help ? Just ask for Raven . She is one of the best in the industry .  It is very nice to see her coaching all the clients who needs advice. Workout plan , diet , lifestyle . She is monitoring and supervising all her clients to the smallest details . Her clients are improving at Gold s in any level . Self confidence and strength guaranteed. Very nice to see the care what she shows day by day every time . Raven Rocks! Karoly Barna
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Karoly! You are one of our favourites! Thank you for remaining such a loyal member! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Best of the best. All the staff are so kind, courteous & helpful, always such a warm-welcoming vibe! They do an amazing job to maintain infection control policies, cleanliness 10/10. The members are also very friendly & respectful. All around good energy. Definitely a great place to work towards your health & fitness goals!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, Noralee! Happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience with us so far, well be sure to let the entire team know what you said! Happy lifting.

reviews.review_text: My trainer, Raven is a great teacher and motivator for me. When I first came into Gold s Gym I was nervous about using the equipment properly and that my form was incorrect. Raven guided me through my programs before I tried them solo in the gym and broke down my form so we could break bad habits and put new/correct ones in place. She has brought back my love for the gym and lifting heavy weights and I couldn t really imagine missing one of my gym days. She s a lot of fun, even when it s way too early in the morning. Super kind and really enjoyed our sessions together.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Claudia! Thank you for the nice feedback! We will be sure to let Raven know! Keep crushing those fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Very well-equipped, well-maintained gym. I worked with Amir Mojibian for three months and he helped me get a good routine going, and we knocked off a bunch of my goals. Hes a fantastic, adaptive coach.

This place is always clean and always a good vibe. Things have been extremely difficult post Covid but this place manages to consistently maintain its cleanliness and uphold its customer service. I see the negative reviews and its mostly about money as if people have some sort of entitled expectations of getting out of contracts just because its a gym. Can you get out of your mortgage as easily? Can you get out of your car lease as easily? And if you do, you pay a penalty. Get over it Vancouver. You want an honest and clean facility to exercise in, this is the place for you! Thank you Golds!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback and support Beauty Body! We are so grateful to have you part of our family! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff. They are eager to help motivate and inspire me to achieve my goals. Covid safety protocols were always in place and disinfectant supplied to all clients. I highly recommend this gym to anyone who wants results fast
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great feedback Johnny! We are so happy to have you part of our community! Keep crushing those fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: My 5 stars review goes to the gym and to my PT Raven! I started my journey towards a healthier and more fit me one year ago and I couldn t be where I am without Raven s training. From the first day Raven understood my goals and my needs and helped me meeting them with passion and patience. She strives for progresses not for perfection. She thought me to be consistent, patient and kind to myself. She believes in me even when I don t and always pushes me to the next level and to give more. I have seen a huge improvement in my body, my weight, my approach to the gym and my techniques since I am training with her. She is definitely a lifestyle trainer and I wish everyone can find their Raven and let their transformation begin!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great feedback! So nice to hear! We will be sure to let Raven know! We are so grateful to have you part of our Golds Gym community! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Been coming here on a regular basis.  Love the gym, and the clean environment. I was having a hard time with my key fob the other day and Savrina at the front desk helped me figure it all out through the golds gym app. Very grateful for being so helpful and kind, will be recommending this gym to all my friends and family
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 stars Adeebah! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Love Golds! New to vancouver and always look forward to my daily gym sessions :) Nicole has always been super friendly, and made me feel welcome from the start. She always has such positive energy and is always there to help me out. All the girls at the front are always so sweet especially Diana/Dana? and Eve/Ava? (im awful with names) I started personal training with Gabe and have been enjoying it! Would 100% recommend him. He is super attentive and great at problem solving  when something isnt working. Always friendly and encouraging :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Olivia! Thank you so much for the feedback! We will be sure to let Nicole, Dara, Eve and Gabe all know how much theyve made you feel part of our community! We are excited to watch you crush your fitness goals! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: This is the best gym in the area! It could be bit a lot better though. It would be nice to have squat rack with wooden floor, and a bench press with adjustable height for people with short arms like me. The gym has high quality up to date equipment, professional staff, clean/well kept, and over all good vibes.

This gym is by far the nicest gym I have ever worked out at! Their Covid protocols are top notch. The staff are so friendly and create a caring atmosphere for their members! Chloe, Tamara, Nicole and Raf are the most wicked morning squad! You re definitely in for a laugh and a friendly greeting with this badass crew
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, Lucy! We are so happy to hear and will be sure to let the morning team know what you said. Happy lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Great gym, all the equipment is new, they have good subscription promotions and their own parking (which is weird in Vancouver and could save you tons of $$) the staff is amazing and welcoming, I had my complementary session with John today and he was incredible, he is very knowledgeable and caring, not only did he answer all the questions I had (which there were a lot) but he made sure I understood everything and actually showed me how to do the exercises properly, how to avoid getting injured and gave me tips to guide me towards my goals. We went well above the hour and he still took the time to show me some exercises I could do at home when I told him I had lower back pain. After 2+ years of doing weights thanks to John I realize that I was doing most of them wrong and that was probably the cause of my lower back pain. I would 100% recommend him, he is not only extremely knowledgeable and helpful but he is really passionate about fitness and helping people :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great review Nea! We will be sure to relay the message to John! So happy to hear he has corrected your form and therefore reducing your injury! Happy youre a member of our community! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: From my experience of the gyms in Vancouver, Golds Gym is one of  the best to go, professional and good machines
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ali! Thank you for you positive feedback! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: This gym is by far one of the best in the area, in my opinion. COVID-19 has been challenging for businesses, especially in the fitness industry, to navigate. However, I feel that this location has done a great job. Staff are friendly, welcoming and accessible at all times for any of your needs. They are responsive both in person, and over the phone to answer any questions or concerns that may arise. The gym is spotless; it is evident that this location values the advice of the Ministry of Health and goes above and beyond the current COVID-19 guidelines. The gym has done its best to institute policies and practices that ensure that every member has the opportunity to have a safe, effective workout. The current guidelines not only hold their staff accountable, but also other members, making it one of the places that I feel the safest in our current state. I will definitely be recommending this gym to my friends and family. The facility itself is top notch, but it is really the staff that make this place excellent. If youre looking for a new gym, look no further than here!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback, Megan! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us and feeling comfortable and safe while you workout. We re excited to watch you achieve your goals with us

reviews.review_text: I had Grace as my personal trainer for a few sessions at this gym. She is a very nice and supportive trainer. She is very good at explaining the mechanics of body movements and helps you reach your goals. The gym itself also has good equipment
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nicki! Thank you for the great 5 star review! We will be sure to let Grace know she is appreciated! Continue to crush those fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Great gym, great atmosphere, and fantastic staff. Jessica took care of my needs during my trial and tour at this location. I appreciate they take covid seriously and it seems that a majority of the members follow up with the rules and cleanliness of the place.

Not many people can get me out of bed before 7am but working out with Raven has been a great experience for the past few months. Raven is a fantastic personal trainer who always motivates me to train harder.  Her personalized workout plans are challenging but fun and has helped me improve my form, gain strength and achieve my fitness goals.  I highly recommend Raven if you are looking for a trainer - she is the best at Golds!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Anita! We appreciate the great feedback and will be sure to also relay the message back to Raven! Excited to watch you continue to crush your fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: I cant say enough great things about this gym, but I will try here. Basically I know you dont want to read an endless review with all the same things that were said so my main point is that this gym is incredible.  The classes are fantastic with excellent, quality instruction.  Everything in the gym is high tech, yet even a low tech woman like me can manage to enjoy it with some guidance.  The free weights and machines are fantastic.... cardio equipment is the best I have ever seen and the assisted stretch area is amazing.  Its a wonderful family run business that has been anything but a cash grab from my experience.  Hopefully see you there for a workout :)

I ve been training with vetri for 2 months and I already feel the difference. The gym is spacious and has a good vibe. Vetri has been wonderful and My main factor to get out of bed and go train. Appreciate the good costumer service I receive for any problems I have.
We LOVE Golds Gym! Our personal trainer, Jean, has gone way beyond any of our expectations to help us achieve goals and set new ones. The equipment, team and COVID safety measures are fantastic.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the 5 stars! We will be sure to let Jean know. Excited to see you guys crush your fitness goals at our facility! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: I ve been training with Raven for over a year now. The gym facilities are fantastic- Golds has everything you need to reach your goals including group classes when they re open. By far though, my PT Raven has had the biggest impact on my success. Not just for what she s taught me about form, new exercises tailored to my goals, and reaching fitness milestones along the way- but for the confidence I ve gained through the process. I ve had incredible physical results from the training, but more importantly was the change in my mindset. Raven taught me to set smaller achievable goals along the journey, find what drives me when I m motivated so I can lean into that when I m not, and that it s not perfection but progress and consistency that are key. Throughout my journey so far she s always been in my corner. More than that though, Raven also taught me to be there for myself.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great 5 star review! So touching to hear the success story and the relationship you have built with your trainer Raven! We will be sure to let her know she is much appreciated!! Continue crushing those goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Good gym and equipment, and happy with covid protocols. Ive been training with Vetri for a month, and I already feel like Im physically stronger than before. Ive neglected physical fitness in the past and hes really helped encourage me to come to the gym more, build a habit of exercising often, and taught me how to train with the right posture.

Im 65 and havent exercised in a very long time  Joined Golds and got a personal trainer and I cant say enough good things about the gym and my trainer, Ryan. He is awesome! So good, in fact, that my son is training with him now.

Gold s West Broadway has done an outstanding job establishing and implementing adequate covid protocols which maintained a safe space for us to continue to workout. The staff is professional and friendly. The facility and equipment are clean and maintained to the highest standards. We love our Gold s Gym!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sophia! Thank you so much for the positive feedback! We are so grateful that you and your family are part of our community! See you guys soon! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Professional gym with professional people! I train with the trainer Mirthy and he s been giving me new concept of what personal training should look like. Besides the great program he designed and his special techniques, he not only made me reaching to my goals, but also keeps me learning. Don t scared by his look, he s really sweet and caring! Highly recommend if you are looking for some serious muscle gain
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great feedback. We will be sure to also relay the message back to Mirthy! Excited to watch you continue to crush your fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: I make my way to this gym daily and have never had an issue. The folks who work there are warm, welcoming and keep the place clean for all gym go-ers. Theyve only recently allowed their members to enter without an appointed schedule which works better with my always fluctuating work hours. Enter when I want, exit when I want (although their busiest hours do have time restrictions. Thankfully that isnt a problem for me) But by far my most favourite thing is that it seems like they have an internal work joke, where the person at front has to go through a certain set of COVID 19 guideline questions (to ensure the safety of their customers) as quickly as possible. Auctioneer level speeds. Very impressive. But yeah, great variety of machines. Clean up after yourself. Maintain social distancing and youre happy as can be.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback Timothy! You have been a great member to us and we are so thrilled to have you part our community! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Great facility - all the equipment you could every want in a gym for cardio and strength. Its a big place. Its clean - constant cleaning actually, and bright (large windows at street level along one wall which you would never know walking on Broadway). The classes they had pre-COVID were frequent and varied including yoga. The personal trainers are also great. I had the benefit of working with Mirthy who was professional, knowledgeable, communicated well and entirely supportive. He supported me in getting started and helped me work through some challenges in biomechanics.  Super highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ryan! Thank you very much for the great feedback! We are so grateful you have chosen Gold s Gym West Broadway to crush your fitness goals! We will also be sure to relay the great message to Mirthy! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Golds is an elite fitness facility with motivated members, friendly and knowledgeable staff, and a perfect location right in the middle of Vancouver. I tried many gyms in Vancouver that were simply just satisfactory before Golds opened up and I couldn t be happier with the gym quality. If you are serious about fitness it is the only credible option in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Jake! We are grateful for you! Happy Lifting! See you soon! :)

reviews.review_text: The Gold s Gym staff may just be the best in the city. Their positive team spirit is infectious and their diplomacy in dealing with the mask rule breakers exemplary :) The facility is spotlessly clean and the atmosphere supports people who are serious about staying healthy! Thanks for giving me another family Gold s! I love you all! -Gabby xo
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great feedback Gabby! :) We are so happy you joined us here and are part of our valued community! Continue to crush those fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: In terms of equipment and atmosphere, this is the best gym Ive trained at in Vancouver. Their TechnoGym machines, the astroturf for dragging the sled and doing tire flips, the lifting platforms, and stretching machines offer more than you can find at most gyms. And its always impeccably clean in the open gym as well as the change rooms/washroom.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Matthew! Thank you for the great review and 5 stars! We appreciate your feedback and having you as a member of our community! Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Being open 24 hours is a huge plus for me. The facilities are new and they have sanitary wipes all over the place to keep it clean. Really happy with this gym. It has classes too but its more focused on working out as an individual than other gyms. Ive done some classes but mostly I like to put my headphones on and go and this is the right gym for that. Most people who work out here are pretty stylish, which I am sure can be a con for some people who like to get bitter about other people looking good, but to me its a motivation to get in better shape.

Amazing gym, they have a wide variety of equipment and everything is very clean. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Also, I booked a tour with Jessica and she was amazing, I recommend booking a tour with her, she explains everything in a way that it is easy to understand. Thank you Jessica!

By far the best gym I d ever gone to. The (pre-Covid) 24/7 hours worked well with my schedule, and the facility+staff attitude was always fantastic. On that note, their personal training program delivers  - I ve worked with Mirthy several times now and already he s helped me improve both my physique and my overall approach to personal fitness.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great feedback! We will be sure to let Mirthy know! Keep crushing those fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Super clean facility, excellent equipment and helpful staff! We came from out of town and wish we could get our own membership here! Thanks for having us!

I was always doubtful about the whole personal trainer thing, especially when I already paid for membership to Gold s. I m no stranger to working out and I ve always been confident in my own ability to do it right, why would I need one? Mirthy has converted me. It s simple as that. I bought a package when i realized i wasn t really getting anywhere and if I was it was taking way too long. I chose him as my trainer because he is obviously invested in fitness (you have to see him to understand!). His knowledge, skill and drive have pushed me into working out the right way to get the results I want and need. He supports, re-focuses and guides. If you want results, he s your man. I ve never felt more alive.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tim! Thank you for the great review! We will be sure to let Mirthy know! We are so proud to see you accomplish your fitness goals with us here at Golds Gym BC! Looking forward to more accomplishments in the future! And grateful for having you part of our Golds Gym community :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: Ali A. is an amazing personal trainer. My partner and I go to him twice a week, and its been a great way to keep on track and get stronger. He is dedicated to seeing us succeed, holds us accountable, and encourages us to be be our best. He is super easy to talk to and makes you feel like you can do anything if you put in the work. Very detail oriented, organized, and kind.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Shawna, thank you so much for the 5 star review! We are so grateful your partner and yourself have joined our community! We will be sure to pass along the wonderful message to Ali! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: The Golds Gym West Broadway location is a fantastic gym with new, clean, and well maintained equipment. The general manager Noz and the front desk staff members Margarita and Odin are super friendly and are just some of the amazing staff members who work there.

As a fitness competitor I have been to many gyms through out the US and Canada. I have seen great gyms, mediocre gyms and the not so great. Gold s Gym West Broadway is beautiful. On top, their staff and management are top notch! The mass return of members to the gym post covid, as one can imagine is no small feat. Management has been so quick to respond and resolve with any issues experienced in the new process. I have never in all my years experienced such amazing member care as I have with Gold s west broadway. (Kudos to Naz and Kyle who have really gone above and beyond with any requests I have had! I know its not easy, but you guys sure make it look simple!)

I have had personal training with both Mirthy Cheung and Vetrivelu Sekar. My experience with both has been phenomenal. They have really helped me achieve my fitness goals. They are both encouraging, and explain exercises in a clear way. Their workout programs are perfect: they find just the right balance between challenging and my comfort zone. I would recommend both Mirthy and Vetri to anyone looking to transform their fitness!

MIRTH was the best trainer Ive ever had. He was knowledgeable,  motivating ,and catered exactly to what your goals are not what they should be. He prepared training sets for me which he gave me. It wasnt just about business it was about building a relationship with him and golds.  He was always responsive to text messages when I had questions and he was very accomadating to your personal schedule. Apart from all that I saw results with him in a month that I could never get by myself. Thanks again man for the training and all the precise and intricate techniques you taught me.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great feedback! We will be sure to let Mirthy know how much he is appreciated! We are grateful you chose Golds Gym West Broadway to crush your fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

reviews.review_text: I just signed up recently and so far this gym has exceeded expectations on every level. Great customer service, super clean, beautiful new equipment, and parking too! I couldnt ask for more. Huge shout out to Ryan Snelling for helping me sign up, making me feel welcome, and going out of his way to ensure my experience has been top notch.
